recuadros-span.northern Chile: Region I y V of Chile

texto-card-home.completo: We are official distributors of YPF, both Diesel and Packaged Gas. We have two YPF service stations located in Salta Capital and Las Lajitas.
texto-card-home.completo2: We offer comprehensive solutions to the field through the distribution of products and services for Crop Protection and Nutrition.
texto-card-home.completo3: We provide comprehensive and customized project management solutions for mining companies.
